metadata.title: CVE-2017-17563 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in Xen through 4.9.x allowing guest OS users tocause a denial of service (host OS crash) or gain host OS privileges byleveraging an incorrect mask for reference-count overflow checking inshadow mode.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-17563` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxen-4.9 - 4.9.2-0ubuntu1
libxenstore3.0 - 4.9.2-0ubuntu1
xen-hypervisor-4.6-amd64 - 4.9.2-0ubuntu1
